name: PANIC ROOM
description:
Introduction

You are a skeleton in a very small dungeon, and more traps keep appearing. You have no choice but to delay your inevitable doom by collecting as many coins as possible... or do you? How long can you last? Where are these spikes coming from? Will you ever be free?


 Features
  • State-of-the-art 4-color graphics
  • Frantic arcade-style gameplay
  • Avoid 5 unique hazards, some of which move to the beat
  • Face 7 difficulty levels as time goes on
  • Die
  • Collect coins to gain additional lives
  • Die again
  • Keep track of your high scores with the leaderboard
  • A hidden unlockable mode for the determined

  Controls
  • Move: Arrow keys or WASD
  • Jump: Z or K
  • ???: X or J
  • Pause: Escape or P
  • Restart: R
  Credits

Code, Art, Design, Sound, and Music by Ghostomato (that's me!)
